column1: Finance and Financial Law (Distance Learning) - MSc
column5: Our MSc Finance and Financial Law programme gives you the expertise to conquer the fast-changing world of finance and financial law. The programme takes an integrated approach to finance and financial law by looking at risk management, regulation, mergers and acquisitions, initial public offerings, bond issues and loans. The programme covers both national and international finance, and looks at how financial and principles are applied in practice, as well as in theory.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
